OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord tumor class ( T1b-c v T2a ) , initial prostate-specific antigen level ( 10 ng/mL vs 10-20 ng/mL v great 20 ng/mL ) , Gleason score ( 2-6 v 7-10 ) participate center . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients undergo 3-dimensional conformal radiotherapy intensity-modulated radiotherapy daily 5 day week 7-7.5 week . - Arm II : Patients receive adjuvant oral bicalutamide daily day 1-30 goserelin subcutaneously day 8 98 . Beginning day 8 , patient undergo radiotherapy arm I . Quality life assess baseline month 6 , 12 , 24 , 36 . Patients follow every 6 month 5 year annually thereafter .
